mcq.statement: Where was a bomb thrown at Lord Hardinge during his state entry to Delhi in 1912?
mcq.one_liner: The location where a bomb was thrown at Lord Hardinge during his state entry to Delhi in 1912 was **Chandi Chowk**.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
